title: 大作文积累
content:
Substantial responsibilities: 大量的工作
Negatively impact mental and physical health: 不好的影响
Sleep deprivation: 睡眠不足
It is likely that: 很有可能
Other than: 以外
Time-consuming: 花费时间
As many as possible: 尽可能多的
With the development of: 随着…发展
Offer great convenience: 方便
Across … barriers: 跨越障碍
Deterrent: 威慑
Enforcement: 执行
Legislation: 法律法规
Compliance: 遵从
Infringement: 违规
Mitigation: 缓解

Reformed criminals – “rehabilitated offenders”
Youth crime prevention – “juvenile delinquency programs”
Consequences – “repercussions,” “legal outcomes”
Influenced by friends – “swayed by peer pressure,” 、“manipulated by acquaintances”
Negative influences – “harmful peer pressure,” “detrimental associations”
be driven 被驱使
seriousness 严重性
crime prevention 预防犯罪
re-entering the society 重返社会
negative peer pressure 负面同伴压力：指来自同龄人的负面影响和压力，使个人做出不良的决定或行为
criminal activities 犯罪活动
